titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd before the Honourable House of Commons at St. Margarets Westminster, upon December the 11th, 1695 being the solemn day of fasting and humiliation for imploring the blessing of Almighty God upon the consultations of this present Parliament / by William Hayley.
titleStmt.author: Hayley, William, 1657-1715.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
